verbs.description: [ARG0: Some residents of Trump Tower] [ARGM-ADV: only] [V: learned] [ARG1: about the inferno] [ARGM-LOC: just floors away on television] , meanwhile resident Dennis Shields got a phone call from the president 's lawyer to get out ASAP .
